storyTitle: As Quote Manager, I want to open existing quotes for editing to update quote details accurately

testCases.title: Validate successful loading and editing of existing quote
preconditions: User has valid Quote Manager credentials
At least one existing quote is available in the system
User has edit permissions for quotes
System is accessible and operational
Browser is supported and up to date

steps.action: Navigate to the quoting system login page and enter valid Quote Manager credentials
steps.expectedResult: User is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard

steps.action: Navigate to the quote search page from the dashboard menu
steps.expectedResult: Quote search page is displayed with search fields and filters available

steps.action: Enter a valid quote ID or customer name in the search field and click Search button
steps.expectedResult: Search results are displayed showing matching quotes with relevant details

steps.action: Select an existing quote from the search results by clicking on it
steps.expectedResult: Quote details load into editable form within 2 seconds with all fields pre-populated with existing data

steps.action: Verify all quote fields are displayed correctly including customer information, line items, pricing, and terms
steps.expectedResult: All quote data is accurately displayed in editable form fields

steps.action: Modify one or more quote fields with valid data (e.g., update pricing, change quantity, modify terms)
steps.expectedResult: Modified fields accept the new values and display real-time validation feedback

steps.action: Click the Submit or Save button to save the changes
steps.expectedResult: System displays a change summary showing all modifications made to the quote

steps.action: Review the change summary and confirm the changes
steps.expectedResult: Changes are saved successfully, a new version is created with incremented version number, and a confirmation message is displayed

steps.action: Verify the new version number is displayed on the quote
steps.expectedResult: Quote shows updated version number and timestamp of the modification

postconditions: Quote is updated with new data
New version of the quote is created in the database
Original quote version is preserved
User remains logged in
Confirmation message is visible to the user

testCases.title: Verify validation prevents saving with missing mandatory fields
preconditions: User is logged in as Quote Manager with edit permissions
An existing quote is available for editing
User has navigated to the quote editing interface
Quote form contains mandatory fields

steps.action: Search for and select an existing quote to open for editing
steps.expectedResult: Quote details load successfully into the editable form with all fields populated

steps.action: Verify the editable form is displayed with all quote fields accessible
steps.expectedResult: Editable form is displayed with all fields including mandatory field indicators (e.g., asterisks or labels)

steps.action: Identify a mandatory field (e.g., Customer Name, Quote Amount, or Expiration Date) and clear its content
steps.expectedResult: Field content is cleared and field is now empty

steps.action: Attempt to save the quote by clicking the Save or Submit button
steps.expectedResult: Validation error message is displayed indicating the mandatory field is required, and save operation is prevented

steps.action: Verify the error message clearly identifies which mandatory field is missing
steps.expectedResult: Error message specifically names the missing mandatory field and provides guidance on how to correct it

steps.action: Fill the mandatory field with valid data that meets all validation requirements
steps.expectedResult: Field accepts the valid data and validation error message disappears or changes to success indicator

steps.action: Click the Save or Submit button again to save the quote
steps.expectedResult: Save operation succeeds, new version is created, and confirmation message is displayed

postconditions: Quote is saved with all mandatory fields populated
New version of the quote exists in the system
Validation rules are enforced
User receives confirmation of successful save

testCases.title: Ensure unauthorized users cannot access quote editing
preconditions: User account exists without quote edit permissions
User has valid login credentials for a non-Quote Manager role
At least one quote exists in the system
Role-based access control is configured and active
Direct URL to quote editing interface is known

steps.action: Navigate to the login page and enter credentials for a user without edit permissions (e.g., Viewer role)
steps.expectedResult: User is successfully authenticated and logged into the system with limited permissions

steps.action: Navigate to the quotes section or dashboard
steps.expectedResult: User can view the quotes section but edit options are not visible or are disabled

steps.action: Attempt to access the quote editing interface through the normal user interface
steps.expectedResult: Access to quote editing interface is denied, edit buttons are disabled or not displayed

steps.action: Copy or manually enter the direct URL to the quote editing interface (e.g., /quotes/edit/12345) in the browser address bar
steps.expectedResult: System detects unauthorized access attempt

steps.action: Press Enter to navigate to the direct URL
steps.expectedResult: Access denied error page is displayed with message indicating insufficient permissions

steps.action: Verify the error message provides appropriate feedback without exposing sensitive system information
steps.expectedResult: Error message clearly states access is denied due to insufficient permissions without revealing system architecture details

steps.action: Verify user is not able to view or modify any quote data through the denied interface
steps.expectedResult: No quote data is displayed and no editing functionality is accessible

postconditions: Unauthorized user remains unable to edit quotes
Security logs record the unauthorized access attempt
User session remains active but with restricted permissions
No quote data is modified or exposed

storyTitle: As Quote Manager, I want to receive notifications when a quote is successfully updated to confirm changes

testCases.title: Validate success notification after quote update
preconditions: User is logged in as Quote Manager with edit permissions
An existing quote is loaded in the editing interface
User has made valid changes to the quote
Notification component is functional
Browser supports notification display

steps.action: Make valid edits to the quote fields (e.g., update pricing, modify terms, change quantities)
steps.expectedResult: Modified fields display the updated values and pass real-time validation

steps.action: Click the Save or Submit button to save the quote edits
steps.expectedResult: System processes the changes and saves the updated quote to the database

steps.action: Observe the screen immediately after the save operation completes
steps.expectedResult: A clear success notification is displayed prominently on the screen within 1-2 seconds

steps.action: Verify the notification contains a success indicator (e.g., green checkmark, success icon, or positive color scheme)
steps.expectedResult: Notification displays visual success indicators that clearly communicate successful completion

steps.action: Read the notification content to verify it includes a summary of the changes made
steps.expectedResult: Notification displays a summary listing the specific fields that were modified (e.g., 'Quote updated successfully: Price changed from $1000 to $1200, Quantity changed from 5 to 10')

steps.action: Verify that no sensitive information such as internal IDs, system paths, or confidential data is exposed in the notification
steps.expectedResult: Notification contains only appropriate user-facing information without exposing sensitive system details

steps.action: Locate and click the dismiss button (X icon, Close button, or similar) on the notification
steps.expectedResult: Notification smoothly disappears from the screen without causing any errors or page refresh

steps.action: Verify the page remains functional after dismissing the notification
steps.expectedResult: Page continues to function normally, quote data remains displayed, and no JavaScript errors occur

postconditions: Quote is successfully saved with new version
Notification has been displayed and dismissed
User has confirmation of successful update
Notification event is logged for audit purposes
User interface remains in stable state

storyTitle: As Quote Manager, I want the system to prevent concurrent edits on the same quote to avoid conflicts

testCases.title: Verify quote locking prevents concurrent edits
preconditions: Two users (User A and User B) are logged into the system with Quote Manager permissions
A valid quote exists in the system and is available for editing
Quote is currently unlocked and not being edited by any user
Both users have network connectivity and active sessions
Locking mechanism is enabled and functioning in the system

steps.action: User A navigates to the quote list and selects a specific quote to edit
steps.expectedResult: Quote details page loads successfully for User A

steps.action: User A clicks the 'Edit' button on the quote
steps.expectedResult: Quote enters edit mode for User A, edit form is displayed with all quote fields editable, and system locks the quote record immediately (within 1 second)

steps.action: Verify lock status in the system database or admin panel
steps.expectedResult: Quote record shows as locked with User A as the lock owner and timestamp of lock acquisition

steps.action: User B navigates to the same quote and attempts to click the 'Edit' button
steps.expectedResult: System prevents User B from entering edit mode and displays a notification message indicating the quote is currently locked by User A with information about who is editing and when the lock was acquired

steps.action: User B verifies the quote remains in read-only mode
steps.expectedResult: All quote fields are displayed but not editable for User B, edit button is disabled or shows locked status

steps.action: User A makes changes to the quote fields (e.g., updates pricing, terms, or line items)
steps.expectedResult: Changes are reflected in the edit form for User A, no errors occur during editing

steps.action: User A clicks the 'Save' button to save the changes
steps.expectedResult: Changes are saved successfully, confirmation message is displayed, and lock is released automatically within 1 second

steps.action: Verify lock status in the system after User A saves
steps.expectedResult: Quote record shows as unlocked, no lock owner is assigned, lock release timestamp is recorded

steps.action: User B refreshes the quote page or attempts to edit the quote again
steps.expectedResult: User B can now successfully click the 'Edit' button and enter edit mode without any lock notification

steps.action: User B enters edit mode and verifies the quote is locked for their session
steps.expectedResult: Quote is locked for User B, edit form is displayed, and system shows User B as the current lock owner

postconditions: Quote is unlocked and available for editing by other users
All changes made by User A are saved and persisted in the database
User B has successfully acquired the lock and is in edit mode
Lock history is recorded in the system audit logs
No data conflicts or integrity issues exist
